text: Fernald Widdershins, or the Hook-handed Man is a villain and antihero from A Series of Unfortunate Events, a series of children's books written by Lemony Snicket. He is part of Count Olaf's acting group, and he has hooks on both of his hands. He is first seen in The Bad Beginning and last seen in The Grim Grotto. He is Captain Widdershins' stepson and has a sister called Fiona. Category:A Series of Unfortunate Events
title: Hook-handed man
